name: Veg Fried Rice
steps: Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Add chopped spring onion, carrot and bell pepper; stir fry for 2–3 minutes.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce; toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper and serve hot.
variations: Add chopped beans or peas for extra veg.
Top with toasted sesame seeds for crunch.

name: Paneer Tikka Bowl
steps: Cut paneer into cubes and marinate with yogurt and spices for 15 minutes.
Thread the paneer, bell pepper and onion onto skewers and grill or pan fry until charred.
Serve the grilled paneer over warm cooked rice and sprinkle with salt to taste.
variations: Swap paneer with tofu for a vegan option.
Add mint chutney on top for extra flavour.

name: Egg Fried Rice
steps: Heat oil in a wok and scramble the eggs until just set; remove and set aside.
In the same wok add spring onion and fry briefly.
Add rice and soy sauce, tossing to heat through.
Return the scrambled eggs to the wok; mix well and season with salt and pepper.
variations: Add frozen peas or corn for colour.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
steps: Slice chicken breast thinly and marinate with soy sauce, garlic and pepper for 10 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok and stir fry chicken until browned.
Add broccoli and bell pepper; cook until crisp tender.
Season with salt if necessary and serve hot.
variations: Add a splash of lime juice at the end.
